page.title: 05M1 MOTORWAY SURVEY
page.content: A traffic survey was taken by a group of pupils at this school. The survey was taken over several days and involved the counting of traffic on the northbound and southbound lanes of the motorway. The survey was taken from the bridge over the motorway near Guilthwaite.Calculations were based on on seperate fifteen minute time spans. Results showed that an average of{567} vehicles passed on the southbound carriageway every fifteen minutes while an average of a {1000}vehicles passed during the same period of time on the northbound lane. Therefore approximately {2268 }vehicles pass south per hour and {4000}vehicles pass north per hour.This shows clearly the amount of traffic carried on the major trunk road. It causes considerable disturbance for Upper Whiston.
